name: capgen
description: Constrained Portfolio Optimization in Liability-Driven Investing

scripts.build:lib: mkdirp bin && emcc --bind -O3 -I. -s WASM=1 -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -s MODULARIZE=1 -s ENVIRONMENT="web" -s 'EXPORT_NAME="libcapgen"' -o ./bin/libcapgen.js ./src/*.cpp
scripts.build: npm run build:test && npm run build:lib && npm run build:app
